      Returns:

    • sortTable

      public Object[][] sortTable(Object[][] eventsData, int[] sort)
      Rearrange the event data according to the sequence in int[] sort
      Parameters:
      eventsData - with the original non sorted event data
      sort - int[] with sort sequence if eventdata
      Returns:
      Object[][] with sorted eventdata
